issue.title: Shazam can't search when traffic control is enabled in Adguard
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Shazam app

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, EasyPrivacy, Online Malicious URL Blocklist

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Hi,

I have found this unusual behaviour which is observed on my old Android 8 phone.
See attached picture below.

When traffic control is enabled in Adguard, Shazam assumes it is offline and can't search for tracks.
But as soon as I disable traffic control, Shazam immediately can access it database to identify a track.

I've been using both apps on this phone for a number of years with no issues. Why is this happening now?

Thanks.

https://i120.fastpic.org/big/2022/0525/22/92b5b72299b4f2ccfe35e492a3e85f22.jpg

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: mayo (ios)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.0 (954)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://apps.apple.com/us/app/mayo-clinic/id523220194

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

||tagdelivery.mayoclinic.org^

app works fine with blocked

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

NextDNS filter 

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://clustrmaps.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Russian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1.  Data brokers and people-search sites are a gross and deeply concerning industry, but they aren't explicitly tracking or advertising per se.

If we want to get our info removed from these sites/databases (and everyone should!), it's necessary to visit the site to do so - but we can't if your filter is blocking the entire site categorically.

2. Screenshots

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

https://imgur.com/a/Przc1cx

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

https://imgur.com/a/UzM0A2O

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

m.10000recipe.com

- [List-KR/List-KR@`626b869` (#357)](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/pull/357/commits/626b869deec8b8459b72e50e9315002235b3c88e)

---

### Prerequisites

  - [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
  - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
  - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
  - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

### What problem does the pull request fix?

  - [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
  - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
  - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
  - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
  - [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
  - [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
  - [ ] Filters maintenance.

### What issue is being fixed?
##### Enter the issue address: https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/pull/357

List-KR doesn't block annoyances by default.
I am adding a rule to filter remaining self-promoting elements.

### Add your comment and screenshots

**1.** Comment

It's a kind of promotion that includes the intent of self-promotion and information about their platform.
However, it's completely not related to what users want to see (it's a recipe), and its height is so big that users are being disturbed.

**2.** Screenshots

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30369714/169645873-8feeeb08-59c5-48bd-95ef-0408b1137855.png)

</details>

### Terms

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -11,6 +11,8 @@
 ! https://developer.chrome.com/docs/privacy-sandbox/topics/
 ! TODO: replace with a scriptlet later: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/Scriptlets/issues/214
 #%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'Document.prototype.browsingTopics', 'undefined')
+! tarnkappe.info revolving tracking
+tarnkappe.info#%#//scriptlet('abort-on-property-read', 'Matomo')
comment.body: Tarnkappe already changed the subdomain a few times, the scriptlet is to defuse the xhr and beacon even if they change the subdomain. Old subdomain was `hokuspokus.tarnkappe.info`

issue.title: www.drive2.ru

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: How can I block this cookie?
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

`donanimhaber.com` website seems to have the Google analytic cookie. I tried this `||donanimhaber.com^$cookie=_ga_` rule but it doesn't show up in the filtering log. Rule wrong?

<details>

![resim png-mh](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/104112959/170302183-dedc21c4-497d-4fd1-8946-fc713d28aa83.png)


</details>

Documentation about the `_ga_` cookie

`https://business.safety.google/adscookies/`

-

issue.title: lenta.ru

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://lenta.ru/news/2022/05/25/top/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Flenta.ru%2Fnews%2F2022%2F05%2F25%2Ftop%2F) ### Comment > При включенном AdGuard страница вначале показывается верно (без рекламы), однако при попытке пролистывания вниз колесиком мыши полностью меняется на другую новостную страницу с этого же сайта. Это происходит не со вcеми, но со многими страницами lenta.ru. ОС Linux (Fedora 35), Firefox 100.0. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/lbRA3Et.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/Ljm3PLj.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.0.161 Browser: | Firefox Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Block WebRTC,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard URL Tracking,
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian Other extensions used: | не использую

We already have a scriptlet below in this file, also add a domain to the HTML rule `$$script[wildcard="*function*break;case*"][min-length="30000"][max-length="100000"]`
```
! #%#//scriptlet("abort-current-inline-script", "document.createElement", "break;case")
```

issue.title: pogoda.yandex.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
